entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
